Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka will be keen to avoid a whitewash and put up a strong performance in the final T20I.
India has shown dominance in the series with their all-round performances.
Sri Lanka’s key players like Wanindu Hasaranga and Dasun Shanaka can turn the game in their favor if they perform to their potential.
India’s consistency and depth in both batting and bowling make them the favorites.
Both teams need to maximize their scoring during the powerplay overs while minimizing early wickets.
Spinners from both sides will play a crucial role in the middle overs, aiming to restrict runs and take crucial wickets.
Effective execution in the death overs with both bat and ball could be the deciding factor.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Pallekele Cricket Stadium is expected to be balanced, offering assistance to both batsmen and bowlers.
The weather in Kandy is expected to be showers in the morning, With a clear and sunny afternoon/evening.

The predicted playing XI for Sri Lanka includes Pathum Nissanka, Avishka Fernando, Charith Asalanka (c), Dasun Shanaka, Kusal Mendis (wk), Wanindu Hasaranga, Ramesh Mendis, Maheesh Theekshana, Dushmantha Chameera, Dilshan Madushanka, and Matheesha Pathirana.

The predicted playing XI for India includes Shubman Gill, Yashasvi Jaiswal, Suryakumar Yadav (c), Rinku Singh, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Rishabh Pant (wk), Washington Sundar, Arshdeep Singh, Mohammed Siraj, Ravi Bishnoi.
